item.title: The Water Jug Riddle from Die Hard Movie
item.description:
This riddle is featured in Die Hard with a Vengeance where Bruce Willis and Samuel L. Jackson have to diffuse a bomb by placing a 4 gallon jug of water on a set of scales…

You have a 3-gallon and a 5-gallon jug that you can fill from a fountain of water. The problem is to fill one of the jugs with exactly 4 gallons of water. How do you do it?
